name: Hylo 0.2% drops
description: Sodium Hyaluronate is a substance that is similar to the fluid surrounding your joints. This fluid serves as a lubricant as well as an absorber of shock for the joints.Sodium Hyaluronate treats osteoarthritic knee pain. Sodium Hyaluronate is typically prescribed when other arthritic medicines have failed to provide relief.To prevent dry eyes, eye drops of Sodium Hyaluronate are utilized. It could also be used to preserve ocular tissues from stress during eye surgery.
label: medicine
